sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using Marketplace, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, do not use our services.

sections.title: User Responsibilities
content: Use the service for lawful purposes.
Maintain the confidentiality of your account information.

sections.title: Data Processing and Privacy
sections.content: We process your personal data as outlined in our Privacy Policy. By using our services, you consent to data collection and processing in compliance with GDPR.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on Marketplace is owned by us or licensed. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.

sections.title: Termination
sections.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account for violation of these terms.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the Netherlands.

sections.title: Updates to Terms
sections.content: We may update these terms periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with a revised effective date.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: For any questions, please contact us at 466069@student.fontys.nl.
